content.rendered:
Our School Curriculum

We operate a British Curriculum, broad-based and globally relevant.

We have thought well about what is currently relevant and we have embraced a unique line of learning that you are proud of. We have ensured that our curriculum meets international standards and you would not have to worry if your kid is going abroad for high school education.


Our curriculum :

• ensures that pupils receive a broad and balanced education, with a focus on core subjects such as English, Math, and Science that are crucial to children’s development

• promotes regular testing, enabling educators to continuously track pupils’ progress and address any gaps observed.
